text: Hi Rob, no worries at all. I am currently looking to get into Real Estate Investment following my 6 month placement is Asset Management which lead to the interest. I have done quite a bit of reading on the industry but I haven't had a conversation with someone in the industry. Currently I am about to start my third year at the University of Bath on the Business Administration course which has its second 6 month industrial placement in the second semester of this year.
